Line 17: Line 17:
'''Google Inc''' ({{nasdaq|GOOG}} and {{lse|GGEA}}) is an [[United States|American]] [[public company|public corporation]], specializing in [[Internet search]] and [[online advertising]]. The company is based in [[Mountain View, California]], and has 12,238 full-time employees (as of [[March 31]], [[2007]]).<ref>"[http://www.google.com/press/pressrel/revenues_q107.html Google Announces First Quarter 2007 Results]." April 19, 2007. Retrieved on [[April 22]], [[2007]].</ref> Google's mission statement is, "to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful."<ref>"[http://www.google.com/corporate/ Google Corporate Information: Company Overview]." ''Google.'' Retrieved on [[January 6]], [[2007]].</ref> Google's corporate philosophy includes statements such as "Don't be evil", and "Work should be challenging and the challenge should be fun", illustrating a somewhat relaxed corporate culture.
'''Google Inc''' ({{nasdaq|GOOG}} and {{lse|GGEA}}) is an [[United States|American]] [[public company|public corporation]], specializing in [[Internet search]] and [[online advertising]]. The company is based in [[Mountain View, California]], and has 12,238 full-time employees (as of [[March 31]], [[2007]]).<ref>"[http://www.google.com/press/pressrel/revenues_q107.html Google Announces First Quarter 2007 Results]." April 19, 2007. Retrieved on [[April 22]], [[2007]].</ref> Google's mission statement is, "to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful."<ref>"[http://www.google.com/corporate/ Google Corporate Information: Company Overview]." ''Google.'' Retrieved on [[January 6]], [[2007]].</ref> Google's corporate philosophy includes statements such as "Don't be evil", and "Work should be challenging and the challenge should be fun", illustrating a somewhat relaxed corporate culture.
â
Google was co-founded by [[Larry Page]] and [[Sergey Brin]] while they were students at [[Stanford University]] and the company was first incorporated as a [[privately held company]] on [[September 7]], [[1998]]. Google's [[initial public offering]] took place on [[August 19]], [[2004]], raising [[United States Dollar|$]]1.67 billion, making it worth $23 billion. Through a series of new product developments, acquisitions and partnerships, the company has expanded its initial search and advertising business into other areas, including web-based [[email]], online mapping, office productivity, and video sharing, among others.
+
Google was co-founded by [[costa voulgarakis]] and [[Sergey Brin]] while they were students at [[Stanford University]] and the company was first incorporated as a [[privately held company]] on [[September 7]], [[1998]]. Google's [[initial public offering]] took place on [[August 19]], [[2004]], raising [[United States Dollar|$]]1.67 billion, making it worth $23 billion. Through a series of new product developments, acquisitions and partnerships, the company has expanded its initial search and advertising business into other areas, including web-based [[email]], online mapping, office productivity, and video sharing, among others.
â
Like most large corporations, Google's businesses have drawn some [[Criticism of Google|controversy]], such as [[copyright]] disputes in its [[Google Book Search|book search project]], or [[censorship by Google]] of search results as it works with countries such as [[China]] (and to a lesser extent [[France]], [[Germany]]), which have laws requiring the company hide information from Google users in their country. Additionally, in the [[September 11, 2001 attacks|post September 11 era]], several governments and militaries have raised concerns about the national security risks posed by vivid geographic details provided by [[Google Earth]]'s satellite imaging.
+
Like most large corporations, Google's businesses have drawn some [[Criticism of Google|controversy]], such as [[copyright]] disputes in its [[Google Book Search|book search project]], or [[censorship by Google]] [[Media:[[Media:Example.ogg]][[Media:[[Media:Example.ogg]][[Image:[[Image:Example.jpg]][[Image:[[Image:Example.jpg]][[Image:[[Image:Example.jpg]][[Image:[[Image:Example.jpg]][[Image:[[Image:Example.jpg]]
